title: The Best of RISK! #13 (CRE921)
description:
A Classic RISK! re-run of our 13th compilation of some the best true stories told on the RISK! podcast.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (London Music Works, Gastor Almonte, The Jane Mutiny, Shamyla, Iron & Wine, Rich Monahan, U.S. Army Blues, Angel, Mollena Williams-Haas, Prince, The New Power Generation, Jeff Barr, Burke Heffner, Kevin Allison, Sarah Long Hendershot)
